# SRSpeechMetrics

**Class**

An object that represents metrics about a range of speech.

## Declaration

```swift
class SRSpeechMetrics
```

## Overview

To get the audio level, use the [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRSpeechMetrics/audioLevel] property. Otherwise, use the [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRSpeechMetrics/speechRecognition], [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRSpeechMetrics/soundClassification], and [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRSpeechMetrics/speechExpression] properties to get characteristics of the speech.

The [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRSensor/siriSpeechMetrics] sensor provides this class as its [doc://com.apple.sensorkit/documentation/SensorKit/SRFetchResult/sample] type.

## Getting session information

- **sessionIdentifier**: An identifier for the audio session.
- **sessionFlags**: Details about the audio processing.
- **SRSpeechMetrics.SessionFlags**: Possible details about processing an audio stream.
- **timeSinceAudioStart**: The number of seconds since the start of the audio stream.
- **timestamp**: The date and time when the speech occurs.

## Getting speech metrics and analytics

- **audioLevel**: The audio level of the speech.
- **SRAudioLevel**: An object that represents the audio level for a range of speech.
- **speechRecognition**: The partial or final results of the speech recognition request.
- **soundClassification**: The highest-ranking classifications in the time range.
- **speechExpression**: The metrics and voice analytics for the range of speech.

## Analyzing speech

- **SRSpeechExpression**: An object that represents the metrics and voice analytics for a range of speech.
